entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 12.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 60%
